title: Picture Canada
creator_credit: Crawley Films, Kodak Canada Inc. and Jim Turpie
brief_description: The work of fifteen photographers went into the filming of this memorable picture of Canada - vivid coast to coast impressions of the Canadian mosaic, the diversity of scene, life and culture with historical re-enactments. Fast-paced and entertaining using innovative cinematography and early 70’s music soundtrack.
